          <title>
            <string language="es">Tipos de glaciares</string>
            <string language="en">Types of glaciers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Typen der Gletscher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Types de glaciers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tipos de geleiras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tipi di ghiacciai</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τύποι παγετώνων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Explicación básica de las generalidades de los glaciares inlandsis, alpino, pirenaico y de pie de monte.</string>
            <string language="en">Basic explanation of the general characteristics of ice sheets, alpine, Pyrenean and valley glaciers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">glaciares</string>
            <string language="en">glaciers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Erklärung der allgemeinen 
Eigenschaften der Eisblätter, alpin, des Pyrenean und der 
Senkegletscher.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explication de base des caractéristiques 
générales des glaciers de feuilles, alpestres, de Pyrénéen et de 
vallée de glace.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explanação das características gerais de 
folhas do gelo, alpine básicos, de Pyrenean e de geleiras do vale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spiegazione delle caratteristiche generali dei 
fogli del ghiaccio, alpino di base, di Pyrenean e dei ghiacciai della 
valle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασική εξήγηση των γενικών χαρακτηριστικών των φύλλων
πάγου, των αλπικών, pyrenean και παγετώνων κοιλάδων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gletscher</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
